title: Sunny well-maintained 4 rm 1br 1ba 1st fl unit TOP LOCATION!!  9/1
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $1,900 / Month
Beds: 1
Bath: 1
Available Date: 09/01/2022
Pet: No Pets
Parking:: off-street parking
PLEASE CALL WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING.
VIEWINGS CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.
A great alternative to apartment building living!!!
Sunny first-floor unit of a well-maintained two-family home in a great EAST ARLINGTON neighborhood.
The unit features hardwood floors throughout.
This is a 4 room, 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit.
There is a large living room with a decorative mantle, a formal dining room with a built-in hutch, one bedroom, and a kitchen.
(Please note there is no dishwasher)
There are all newer vinyl replacement windows throughout and there is a gas heating system.
The tenant pays all of their own utilities.
A coin-operated washer and dryer are provided in the basement for the tenant's convenience as well as a small amount of additional storage.
Off-street parking is provided for one to two cars in the tenant's own driveway.
This unit is located in one of the MOST convenient areas of town.
One block to Mass Ave and buses to Alewife, Porter, and Harvard.
Close to the shops and restaurants of East Arlington (Town Taven, Menotomy Grill, Za ) and the Capital Theater.
You can always skip the bus and take the Minuteman Path to the Alewife Red Line Station in less than 10 minutes.
Easy access to all major roads including Routes 2, 93, 128, and the river roads to and from Boston making this a commuter's dream location.
Sorry, absolutely NO PETS!!!
Smoking is not permitted inside the home.
APPLICANTS MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT TO QUALIFY.
FEATURES
Dining Room
Hardwood Floors
Laundry in Building
Living Room
Porch
Separate Kitchen
Storage
Yard
